text:
JDK1.4.1, I didn't test any other JDK.

I create a new Test Plan with an HTTP Request and a HTTP Default Request, but 
JMeter did not use the values form the Default Request, because in the, for 
example Server and IP, field is one "Space" (like " "). If I delete that JMeter 
works correct, but if I save this and load it new the "Space" is always there.
creator: jochen.stiepel@dresdner-bank.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text:
I tried with both JMeter 1.7 and 1.8, and I couldn't reproduce this problem.
Does anyone know on which version this was observed?
*** Bug 12791 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text:
Since I can't reproduce and I've been told it was fixed a (long) while ago, I'll
close this as fixed.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text: Bulk-editing to close all bugs reported fixed by 1.8.1.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
